    • Constructor Detail

      • Solider

        public Solider​(city.cs.engine.World world)
        Constructor for the solider.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to place the soldier in.

    • Method Detail

      • getFacingImage

        public static city.cs.engine.BodyImage getFacingImage​(java.lang.String orientation)
        used to change the image on the solider.
        Parameters:
        orientation - is the direction in which the character is going
        Returns:
        BodyImage type

      • flyPowerUp

        public void flyPowerUp()
        Triggers a timer task and schedules it for 3 seconds with a 400ms delay. Function is called when the Player collides with the Potion

      • setBulletCount

        public void setBulletCount​(int bulletCount)
        Changes the number of bullets the soldier can shoot. This is typically used when loading a save file where the no. of bullets is saved in a text file.
        Parameters:
        bulletCount - the new no. of bullets

      • getBulletCount

        public int getBulletCount()
        Returns the number of bullets the solider has. This is usually called to check whether the solider can still shoot bullets when the mouse is clicked.
        Returns:
        integer value of number of bullets

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Returns the integer value of the solider's health out of 100. This is typically called when displaying the solider's health in a progress bar as the game progresses.
        Returns:
        health of the solider. Maximum value 100, minimum 0.

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth​(int health)
        Changes the solider's health. This is typically called when loading up a save of the game or when advancing the game to the level of the game.
        Parameters:
        health - the new health of the solider.

      • incrementBulletCount

        public void incrementBulletCount()
        Increment the bullet count by 1. Called when the solider collects bullets.

      • decrementBulletCount

        public void decrementBulletCount()
        Decrement the bullet count by 1. Usually called when the mouse is clicked and a bullet is shot from the solider.

      • decrementHealth

        public void decrementHealth​(int damageTaken)
        Decrement solider health by the parameter given. Method is used when the solider touches the lava or an enemy.
        Parameters:
        damageTaken - the value to subtract from the soldier health.

      • getStartPosition

        public org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getStartPosition()
        Returns the initial position of the solider when the current level is ran.
        Returns:
        the position of the solider as a Vec2

      • setStartPosition

        public void setStartPosition​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 startPosition)
        Changes the start position of the solider.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - the new initial position of the solider
